original_title: Motorists using expressways urged to limit speed due to bad weather
original_body_lines: Expressway Traffic Police Division has informed the motorists using the expressways to limit their vehicle speed to 60 kilometres per hour, due to adverse weather conditions prevailing in Sri Lanka.

Meanwhile, the police also notify drivers to keep proper distance between the vehicles while driving and to keep the front and rear lights on until they reach their destinations due to the low light conditions.
